name: SÌ PASSIONE AMORE 2019
description: Sì Passione, the new perfume for women by Giorgio Armani, comes now in a limited edition Amore bottle. A powerful reinvention of the signature Armani fragrance, Sì Passione adds a new dimension to Giorgio Armani’s feminine fragrance personality that is, in his own words: “an irresistible combination of grace, strength and independent spirit". An intense, uncompromising scent for a confident woman who dares to say yes.
